structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.catch_line: Notice and hearing of exceptions to classification report.
law.text: When this report of classification of benefits is filed, the clerk shall, within five (5) days, cause notice of the filing of same to be given by publication pursuant to KRS Chapter 424, and by notices posted in three (3) public places within the sewer construction district. The hearing shall be held not more than twenty (20) days from the first published notice. Property owners may file exceptions to said report at any time up to the day the proceeding is docketed. The county judge/executive may hear the proceeding on that day, unless further time be required.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 207, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 30. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 12.
